title.rendered: Be your best self with Miriam Goldberg

content.rendered:
How to be your

happiest

healthiest

strongest

most free

most fulfilled

most empowered

best

self
Work with a HARVARD psychology educated coach to define and achieve your goals
Book Now
are you ready to change your life?

Every person has the power

to become the very best version of themselves, surrounded by healthy relationships.

Relationships

When it comes to romantic relationships, family, or friends, building healthier relationships can contribute so much to your life.

Health

This is the main underlying factor enabling a better life.

Happiness

You deserve it, and you can achieve it.

What do I do?

how I can help you:

I work with each client and help support them with bespoke therapy designed specifically to fit their unique needs. People don’t always know the root of their struggles. I help discover what this is and create a path to change it. You have the power to change your life today. Through weekly or bi-weekly sessions, we explore the relationships in your life and help transform them to being happier and healthier.

Here's how it works.

My formula for creating positive change:
01

Reflect

The first step is sharing where you’re coming from and considering where you want to be. It is most important that you decide to make a change.

02

Discover

Together we can dive deep, exploring what might be happening, noticing any patterns in your life, and looking at what is holding you back.

03

Build

Once we uncover what’s blocking you in your life, we will embark on a journey of your learning and growth, as I support you towards making positive changes.

04

Maintain

Building positive habits and creating changes can take time and accountability. Even once things start feeling better, having support to keep it that way is key.

You can do it

When you want to make a change, anything is possible. You know your own life, and I know the science, theory, and application. Together we can work towards building whatever it is you want to create and make your dreams come true.

Dating, Family, Health, and Happiness Coach

Miriam Goldberg

Based in Los Angeles with my husband and dog, living a vegan lifestyle, traveling the world, and making music and art. After growing up here, I spent the past 11 years living in New York, Israel, Germany, and London. I've always had an interest in the relationships people have with others, and themselves, and have always helped the people around me grow and find their true happiness. I have a Graduate Certificate from Harvard in Topics in Human Behavior. Currently, I'm in the process of getting my Master's in Psychology at Harvard, where I've studied in depth, everything from The Psychology of Close Relationships, to The Science of Physical Activity Applied to Health and Wellbeing. My greatest passion is helping people achieve unlimited happiness in their relationships. Let's work together to achieve whatever it is you are looking for.
Testimonials

Yes, it works!

It changed their lives and can change yours too.

  • "Miriam leaves you with a very clear road..."

    Alex C.
    Miriam leaves you with a very clear road to whatever you are trying to achieve by the end of each conversation. Talking to Miriam feels like talking to an old friend who is incredibly wise. My favorite thing about her program is her 'small steps everyday' method — it has been and continues to be successful for me. She is very well suited for this profession, her easy going nature helps you open up and talk from the root of your issues, and most importantly, her professional advice gets you results.

  • "She’s the perfect combination of supportive and telling it like it is."

    Emily S.
    Miriam has an uncanny ability to read people and understand what they need to be a healthier and happier version of themselves. She’s the perfect combination of supportive and telling it like it is when tough truth is needed. She’s also incredibly selfless and goes above and beyond to help her clients. Highly recommend her to anyone trying to navigate the professional world or romantic relationships as a young adult.

  • "If you are looking to change your life for the better and need some guidance and tools, RUN don’t walk to Miriam!"

    Ari F.
    Miriam is such an amazing person and has such incredible insights that continuously change my life. I’ve been her unofficial patient for about 15 years and official patient since she started her practice (everyone who knows Miriam has told her she has to do this professionally because she has changed everyone’s lives who know her for the better.) If I’m ever having a bad day, having to work through a life issue or family or money issue, Miriam is the person I call. Through her guidance she’s helped me out of many problems in my life and helped me change my mindset to be postiive and full of serenity. Thank you Miriam! If you are looking to change your life for the better and need some guidance and tools, RUN don’t walk to Miriam!

  • "Miriam is incredibly skilled at patiently listening to you about your life, your goals and your struggles."

    Emily G.
    She has the ability to see the entire picture and get to the root of your successes and areas with room for improvement. She carefully considers what you want out of life and collaboratively helps you fill in the steps towards achieving your goals. Her manner is compassionate, thoughtful and realistic and she truly believes that everyone can achieve their goals! She helps crystallize a roadmap to happiness as well as supporting you along the way to your goals! I cannot thank her or recommend her services enough!

  • "Miriam knows how to bring you up when you feel your lowest."

    Ariella D.
    Miriam completely immersed herself in my issues and genuinely cared about helping me create doable action items that would lead me to become a better version of me. I’m so thankful for Miriam and her natural gift for problem solving, shining positivity on any story or issue, and ability to lift a heavy weight off your shoulders. Miriam somehow makes it seem like it’s not so difficult to achieve what you want. I would recommend contacting her right away if you need help with relationships, work, or just life!

  • "A true privilege to have Miriam in my life."

    Ben L.
    For as long as I can remember Miriam has been an unbelievable listener and advisor as a friend. She's able to quickly understand any situation and offer meaningful, actionable insight. It's rare to find someone with this skill set, a true privilege to have Miriam in my life.

  • "I really feel like I’m now the best version of myself and owe that to Miriam!"

    Alexandra G.
    Thank you so much for the motivation which helped me in taking that leap of faith and starting my own business. Thanks for giving me the courage. You taught me how to believe in myself more than ever. You’re so easy to speak to and open up with. I really appreciate such a clear perspective on my life that doesn’t have any judgement, and your positive attitude, which helps drive my ideas into reality. Miriam has taught me to create sustainable goals and see them through. I really feel like I’m now the best version of myself and owe that to Miriam!

  • "Even from just one session I walked out with a fresh new outlook and an action plan on how to develop myself further."

    Masha L.
    I had a great session with Miriam! She is a really lovely person and you can tell just from the first 5 minutes - super friendly, kind, and personable. She gave me a lot of advice and steps to move forward, as well as a new and positive way to look upon myself and my journey in life. I would really recommend signing up for coaching from Miriam because even from just one session I walked out with a fresh new outlook and an action plan on how to develop myself further. Thanks Miriam!! 💪🏽😄

Pricing

Sometimes all it takes is a new perspective and someone to believe in you, and you can do anything.

Our clients work at Google, Amazon, small startups, big startups. We coach many influencers. We have clients in Marketing, Politics, Events, Photography, Executives, Sales, HR, and more.

Our clients are from Los Angeles, New York, London, Tel Aviv, Paris, Rome, China, Singapore, Istanbul, Jamaica, Miami, Melbourne, Rio de Janeiro, Amsterdam, Munich, Berlin, and more.

We work with women who are single, men who are dating, women who are married, women who want to date, women who don’t, bisexuals, gay, straight – you name it – we have experience with them and they are welcome here.

Whoever you are and wherever you are – we can help you!
